content.text: Not much, just getting ready for a tournament this weekend.
A fencing tournament. I've been fencing for about 5 years now and I'm pretty competitive.
That's awesome! Do you compete often?
Yeah, I try to compete as much as I can. I'm really looking forward to this weekend's tournament.
I bet you'll do great! What's your favorite part of fencing?
I love the challenge of it. It's a really intense sport and I love the feeling of competing against other people.
That makes sense. I can imagine it being really exciting.
It is! And it's a great way to stay in shape.
That's true. I'm trying to get more exercise, but I'm not very good at it.
You should try fencing! It's a lot of fun and it's a great workout.
I might just do that. Thanks for the suggestion!
